fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: ~ Swap 6 player's roles once, this may not include yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ Swapped player's roles are put in a pot and randomly assigned back, while not getting their old role back.
~ You win with any faction you have swapped with. Everyone of said faction will be informed.
~ If this appears a faction that is able to convert must appear as if rolled naturally.
